message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can talk about it further in the next round.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can have 65% and I'll take 35%.
I'm still not happy with this split.  Let's try a 75/25 split.  If you reject this, I'm going to be more aggressive with my offers in the future.
I'm not willing to give you 75% of the money. I'll give you 80% and take 20% if you accept this offer.
